product_name: Brooks L.S.D. Lite Jacket III - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A packable, weather-resistant and lightweight jacket or training runs in any setting, the men's Brooks L.S.D. Lite III jacket is easy to bring along when the weather is unpredictable. Extremely lightweight microfiber polyester fabric is highly breathable and resists light precipitation and wind thanks to a Durable Water Repellent finish. Dual rear vents increase breathability. Internal pocket manages your music player, and jacket packs into its own zippered pocket. Hood cinches from front to back to create a close, comfortable fit. Reflective detailing increases your visibility to motorists in low light. Weighs 4.3 oz. (size Medium). The semifitted L.S.D. Lite III jacket for men is not too tight and not too loose. Closeout.
short_description: A packable, weather-resistant and lightweight jacket or training runs in any setting, the men's Brooks L.S.D. Lite III jacket is easy to bring along when the weather is unpredictable.
